summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the north side of East Madison Street in the City of Seattle from Washington Boulevard to Laurel Shade Avenue, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1290 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
